name: Arashi Awaken
description:
In the ninja world, undercurrents are surging, and various forces check and balance each other. Can you become the leader?

Game features:

【Legendary ninjas】
-Recruit legendary ninjas to help you unify the ninja world.

【Strategy】
-Combat power is important, but strategy cannot be ignored.

【Anime style】
-Characters that appear in the anime will appear in the game, come and meet your favorite ninja.
